esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert when interfaces drop >25 packets/sec or more than 1% of traffic over the configured time window.
// Excludes loopback/container interfaces, requires minimum packet volume, and guards against counter resets.
// Adjust absolute or percentage thresholds in the final WHERE clause as needed.
FROM metrics-system.network-*
| WHERE `system.network.name` NOT RLIKE "^(lo|docker|veth|br-)"
| STATS
max_in_dropped = MAX(`system.network.in.dropped`::LONG),
min_in_dropped = MIN(`system.network.in.dropped`::LONG),
max_out_dropped = MAX(`system.network.out.dropped`::LONG),
min_out_dropped = MIN(`system.network.out.dropped`::LONG),
max_in_packets = MAX(`system.network.in.packets`::LONG),
min_in_packets = MIN(`system.network.in.packets`::LONG),
max_out_packets = MAX(`system.network.out.packets`::LONG),
min_out_packets = MIN(`system.network.out.packets`::LONG),
first_ts = MIN(@timestamp),
last_ts = MAX(@timestamp)
BY `host.name`, `system.network.name`
| EVAL elapsed_ms = TO_DOUBLE(TO_LONG(last_ts) - TO_LONG(first_ts))
| EVAL elapsed_sec = CASE(elapsed_ms > 0, elapsed_ms / 1000.0, 0.0)
| WHERE elapsed_sec >= 60
| EVAL in_drop_delta = CASE(max_in_dropped >= min_in_dropped, max_in_dropped - min_in_dropped, 0)
| EVAL out_drop_delta = CASE(max_out_dropped >= min_out_dropped, max_out_dropped - min_out_dropped, 0)
| EVAL in_packet_delta = CASE(max_in_packets >= min_in_packets, max_in_packets - min_in_packets, 0)
| EVAL out_packet_delta = CASE(max_out_packets >= min_out_packets, max_out_packets - min_out_packets, 0)
| EVAL total_packets = in_packet_delta + out_packet_delta
| WHERE total_packets >= 1000
| EVAL in_drop_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, in_drop_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL out_drop_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, out_drop_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL in_drop_pct = CASE(in_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * in_drop_delta / TO_DOUBLE(in_packet_delta), 0.0)
| EVAL out_drop_pct = CASE(out_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * out_drop_delta / TO_DOUBLE(out_packet_delta), 0.0)
| WHERE in_drop_rate > 25
OR out_drop_rate > 25
OR in_drop_pct > 1
OR out_drop_pct > 1
